actionCalls.name: myRule_1_A1
actionCalls.label: Call Quote Flow To Update Primary Contact

rules.name: myRule_14
rules.label: Check Proposal Sent On Date Is Populated For Direct RO & FS Opportunity

rules.name: myRule_6
rules.label: Check Proposal Sent On Date Is Populated For Direct Standard Opportunity

Flow.description: Updates Primary Contact, RTP fields on Quotation and Creates Task when Proposal Sent On Date is populated

value.stringValue: AND ( OR ( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED ( [Opportunity].Sales_Area_Sold_To__c ) ), TEXT ([Opportunity].StageName) <>$Label.OpportunityStageClosedLost , TEXT ([Opportunity].StageName) <>$Label.OpportunityStageClosedWon , TEXT ([Opportunity].StageName) <>$Label.OpportunityStageClosedAbandoned , NOT ( ISBLANK ( [Opportunity].Sales_Area_Sold_To__c )) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_4
formulas.expression: AND ( OR ( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED ( {!myVariable_current.Sales_Area_Sold_To__c} ) ), TEXT ({!myVariable_current.StageName}) <>{!$Label.OpportunityStageClosedLost} , TEXT ({!myVariable_current.StageName}) <>{!$Label.OpportunityStageClosedWon} , TEXT ({!myVariable_current.StageName}) <>{!$Label.OpportunityStageClosedAbandoned} , NOT ( ISBLANK ( {!myVariable_current.Sales_Area_Sold_To__c} )) )

Flow.label: Opportunity: Update Primary Contact & RTP Fields On Quotation & Task Creation

recordCreates.name: myRule_14_A1
recordCreates.label: Create Task For Direct RO & FS When Proposal Sent On Date Is Populated

recordCreates.name: myRule_6_A1
recordCreates.label: Create Task For Direct Standard Opportunity
